text: Hey everybody, sounds like a cluster out there. We are calling a WFH day. I would encourage everybody to connect with their managers and colleagues to coordinate whatever work you may need. There may be brave souls who wish to walk or drive in, and if you're one of em please let <#C0260V1C3|general> know so we can get a read on the nearby conditions. Be safe out there! <@U0AT77V1U> let's keep in touch, we may have a walk in or two (maybe <@U02F8LF2X>)?
<@U02918BKW>: will do. Ill hold off for a while, have had several calls this am, with driving in warnings...slick streets <@U02F8LF2X>
